---
category: news
title: "Are AI Hallucinations a Glimpse into Digital Creativity?"
excerpt: "LLM \"hallucinations\" may reflect digital creativity, suggesting a new realm of AI imagination. However, these phenomena can arise from overfitting and data contamination, leading to nonsensical outputs. Multimodal LLMs push creativity beyond language, merging visual, textual, and auditory elements."
